column1: The Pit Room////So tonight was the second time here and even though thought I had just had the best barbecue in town the first time the second time was even better the first time I was there with a group of five and we got the platter number one with several needs everything was delicious it even comes with a pound of beef ribs today I ordered a three meet plate pork ribs fatty brisket and chicken I ate well over half and there's still enough for a big meal.
